text: A faragha mɨzaziba inigha aremegha egha ua dɨkafi. Egha a tɨghar Godɨn Nguibamɨn mangasava, a uabɨ isa uan aposelbar aka. Egha a bizir avɨribar men akazɨ, me bar foz, a ua dɨkavigha iti. 40 plan dughiaba, dughiar kamɨn aven dughiar avɨriba a uabɨ men akakaghava God Bizibagh Ativir Arazimɨn gun me mɨgei.
